relevantArticles.articleAbstractText: 在git push的时候出现OpenSSL SSL_connect: SSL_ERROR_SYSCALL in connection to github.com:443 网上的解决方法都不管用 解决方法: 换网络,连上手机热点,成功 =.=
由于上传命令太多了,所以写了脚本 命名为comgit #!/bin/bash git add –all;git commit -m “$1”;git pull;git push; 使用方法 comgit “comment”

git 教程 Introduction Git is currently the most widely used version control system in the world, mostly thanks to GitHub.(感谢github) By that measure, I’d argue that it’s also the most misunderstood version control system in the world. This statement probably doesn’t ring true straight away because on the surface, Git is pretty simple. It’s really easy to pick up if you’ve come from another VCS like Subversion or Mercurial. It’s even relatively easy to pick up if you’ve never used a VCS before. Ever....
